name: Cortex 911
description:
Endpoint Protection + EDR + Threat Intel + Remediation:
Cortex XDR Licence for Endpoints w/Host-Insights
Cortex XDR Licence for TB (Analytics on PANW and 3rd party Sources)
Autofocus
XSOAR (inc. TIM) Tenant with pre-build playbooks to help CSIRT / MDR to speed-up Investigation and Remediation
Expanse - Expander attack surface viewer
Package in the MarketPlace to integrate XSOAR and XDR and provide all automation immediately
Services:
Partner Incident Response Team (CSIRT). Help understand “what happened?”, by analyzing available information and evidence
Cortex Managed Threat Hunting. 
Monitor “what is happening?”
24/7 threat hunting powered by Cortex XDR and world-class experts from Unit 42 (by palo Alto Networks)
Get assistance from I&R Partner teams to hunt down complex threats 
Crypsis Emergency Response Team - Optional - Can be replaced by RRR’s partners
Duration: 30 days
author: Palo Alto Networks
